title: Soundgarden - A-Sides (1997)@flac
description: For an act that was one of the definitive album artists of the late '80s and '90s, Soundgarden was a surprisingly effective singles band. Their singles effectively conveyed all of their best ideas, from their sludgy early Sub Pop recordings to the elaborate, post-metal psychedelia of their last two albums, Superunknown and Down on the Upside. That's the reason why the 17-track compilation A-Sides is such a successful overview of the band's too-brief career. Most of their peers wouldn't be well represented by a compilation that concentrated solely on singles, but Soundgarden are, because their singles do capture what they're all about. There are many great songs left off A-Sides, from "Big Dumb Sex" to "My Wave," but it's hard to argue with what's here. Each single from every album -- from the 1987 debut EP Screaming Life through SST's Ultramega OK, to their four records for A&M -- is here, with the Down on the Upside outtake "Bleed Together" added as an enticement for collectors. Almost every one of the group's best-known songs are here, including "Hands All Over," "Loud Love," "Jesus Christ Pose," "Outshined," "Rusty Cage," "Black Hole Sun," "The Day I Tried to Live," "Spoonman," "Fell on Black Days," "Pretty Noose," "Burden in My Hand," and "Blow Up the Outside World," resulting in a near-definitive summary of one of the most important and influential bands of the '90s. Outshined [5:12] 08. Rusty Cage [4:27] 09. Spoonman [4:08] 10. The Day I Tried To Live [5:21] 11. Black Hole Sun [5:20] 12. Fell On Black Days [4:42] 13. Pretty Noose [4:13] 14. Burden In My Hand [4:52] 15. Blow Up The Outside World [5:47] 16. Ty Cobb [3:08] 17. Bleed Together [3:51] Vocals, Guitar - Chris Cornell Guitar [Lead] - Kim Thayil Bass - Ben Shepherd (tracks: 6 to 17), Hiro Yamamoto (tracks: 1 to 5) Drums, Percussion - Matt Cameron Track 1 from the 1987 Sub Pop album 'Screaming Life EP'. Track 2 from the 1988 SST album 'Ultramega OK'. Tracks 3 to 5 from the 1989 A&M album 'Louder Than Love'. Tracks 6 to 8 from the 1991 A&M album 'Badmotorfinger'. Tracks 9 to 12 from the 1994 A&M album 'Superunknown'. Tracks 13 to 16 from the 1996 A&M album 'Down On The Upside'. Track 17 is out-take.
